nodes.text: This unidentified majordomo, a male Twi'lek with mottled blue-green skin, served an unknown Nar Shaddaa-based member of the Exchange.

This majordomo was present at the Jekk'Jekk Tarr cantina when Meetra Surik arrived to rescue the bounty hunter Mira. When she did not succumb to the cyanogen gas that the place was filled with, he, along with the rest of the bar's patrons, answered the call to arms from Exchange boss Visquis, seeking the large amount of credits being offered for her capture. He was ultimately killed along with the rest of the hostile cantina denizens.
The character's occupation is derived from his "target box", which reads "Twi'lek majordomo".
